entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
